it.polimi.ingsw.lim.network.server.socket

Class SocketClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.network.server.socket.SocketClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class handles the connection to a socket client. Every client are on a thread that send command to this class. The socket server is sent the command game throw this class, sending Object to output stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      User getUser() 
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, SocketClientHandler handlerCallback)
      Login method.
      void run()
      Create the I/O socket stream, run until the login is successful then listen for a client command

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Returns:
        the user.

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  SocketClientHandler handlerCallback)
           throws LoginFailedException
        Login method. Add to database the username and the password of new client. Check if the inserted password is correct, then add user to room.
        Parameters:
        username - the player's name
        password - the player's password
        handlerCallback - the socket client handler callback
        Throws:
        LoginFailedException - if username or password are wrong

      • run

        public void run()
        Create the I/O socket stream, run until the login is successful then listen for a client command
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
